articles.title: Latest ICC ODI rankings: Shubman Gill jumps to career-best No.2, David Warner enters top three - Wisden
articles.description: Shubman Gill has moved up to career-best No.2 on the latest ICC ODI rankings update. Read to find out all about the latest ICC ODI rankings.
articles.content:
The ICC ODI player rankings have seen a massive shift of positions, with the most prominent of them being the rise of Shubman Gill to No.2 in the batters’ rankings.

articles.title: Jurgen Klopp makes decision on Germany job - Liverpool - 90min UK
articles.description: Jurgen Klopp's agent has discussed whether the Liverpool manager could become the new head coach of the German national team.
articles.content:
Liverpool manager Jurgen Klopp is not looking to become the head coach of the German national team, according to his agent.
